item.title: An Introduction To Web Scraping
item.description: I recently started seeing a lot of posts related to illegal web scarping by AI companies, all thanks to frequency illusion. In this blog, we’ll discuss the basics of web scraping and look into a few ways to scrape things from the web. Legality Before jumping straight up to the weeds, let’s address the elephant in the room: “Is it legal to scrape the web?”. Well, it depends on who we ask this question.
